export default function Table(props){ const formatter = new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD', minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits: 2, }); return( {props.data.map((yearData) => ( ))}
Year Total Savings Interest (Year) Total Interest Invested Capital
{yearData.year} {formatter.format(yearData.savingsEndOfYear)} {yearData.yearlyInterest} {yearData.savingsEndOfYear - props.initialInvestment - yearData.yearlyContribution * yearData.year} {formatter.format(yearData.yearlyContribution + props.initialInvestment * yearData.year)}
) }
